house_listing.house_description: This detached single family home built in 1987 has 3 bedroom(s), 3.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 2503 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, private spa, fireplace, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
